title: Figure of a Crocodile
description:
Blue-green faience figure of a crocodile standing on oblong base. Tail curved to right. Jaws open with wall connecting upper jaw to base. Pierced horizontally under upper jaw. Probably used as an amulet. 
Condition: Surface soiled. Otherwise excellent.
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father, Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
